Installation

pip install fastcam

Basic usage

Here's my favorite function, say_hello:

{% raw %} 
say_hello("Rory")

'Hello Rory!'
{% endraw %}

I like it so much that I even made say_hello_twice:

{% raw %} 
say_hello_twice("Coco")

'Hello Coco! Hello Coco!'
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
